snippet.textDisplay: Sonic music will live on forever in my heart. This is one of my top top favorite VGM tracks since I first heard it back when the game came out.  It's gorgeous and dreamy and  it really worked well with the rainy levels. It has that breezy cool feel to the melody.

snippet.textDisplay: the only ones that have "bad" music are as follows, Boom music was pretty much stock orchestra tracks but they can be enjoyable to some people I personally found them bland. Sonic the Hedgehog Spinball options music is way to loud. sonic eraser soundtrack sucks and sonic chronicles music is horrendous other than the games I listed the rest of the sonic games have decent soundtracks or amazing ones. The number of sonic games with "bad" music is 4 and thats stretching it.
